title: Mainstays Cool Mist Humidifier, 1 gallon, Black; low tank indicator; Dish washer safe; Humidity capacity: 142ml/h; Aroma tray; 3 speeds; mechanical knob; covers 320 sq. ft. area, weight: 6.33 lbs
descriptions:
Product Listing:

Introducing the Mainstays Cool Mist Humidifier, a reliable and efficient way to improve the air quality in your living space. This humidifier is designed with a sleek black exterior, adding a touch of sophistication to any room.

With a tank capacity of 1 gallon, this humidifier provides long-lasting moisture for up to 24 hours. The cool mist evaporative technology ensures a comfortable and refreshing mist that won't leave your room feeling damp.

Featuring a low tank indicator, you'll never have to worry about running out of water. The dishwasher-safe design allows for easy cleaning and maintenance, ensuring the longevity of your humidifier.

The Mainstays Cool Mist Humidifier offers a humidity capacity of 142 ml per hour, creating a comfortable and healthy environment. The aroma tray allows you to add your favorite scents, creating a soothing and pleasant atmosphere.

With 3 speed settings and a mechanical knob control type, you can easily adjust the mist output to suit your preferences. The coverage area of 320 sq ft ensures that every corner of your room receives the benefits of this humidifier.

Weighing only 6.33 lbs, this lightweight humidifier can be easily moved from room to room. The replacement filter compatibility with the BestAir H62 ensures that you can easily find replacement filters when needed.

In addition, the empty tank protection feature automatically shuts off the humidifier when the tank is empty, preventing any damage or accidents.

Upgrade your indoor air quality with the Mainstays Cool Mist Humidifier. Experience the benefits of a properly humidified space and enjoy a healthier and more comfortable living environment.

Product Listing:

Introducing the Mainstays Cool Mist Humidifier in Black, with a 1 gallon tank capacity. This sleek and modern humidifier utilizes cool mist evaporative technology to provide the perfect humidity level for your space. 

With its low tank indicator, you'll never have to worry about running out of water. And when it's time to refill, simply remove the tank and place it in the dishwasher for easy cleaning. 

The Mainstays Cool Mist Humidifier offers a humidity capacity of 142 ml per hour, ensuring optimal moisture levels in rooms up to 320 square feet. 

Customize your experience with the built-in aroma tray, allowing you to add your favorite essential oils or fragrances for a soothing atmosphere. 

With 3 speed settings and a mechanical knob control type, you can easily adjust the mist output to your desired level. 

Weighing just 6.33 lbs, this lightweight humidifier is easy to move and transport. 

The Mainstays Cool Mist Humidifier is compatible with the BestAir H62 replacement filter, providing clean and fresh mist every time. 

And for your convenience, it also features empty tank protection, ensuring the humidifier automatically shuts off when the tank is empty. 

Experience the benefits of a cool mist humidifier with the Mainstays Cool Mist Humidifier in Black.
